text:
[Verse]
Night falls city awake
Under stars the nightlife shakes
Heartbeats fast we chase the dream
Neon lights start to gleam

[Verse 2]
Dancing feet can't be still
Skyline high on the hill
Rhythm takes us we're alive
Under the moon we thrive

[Chorus]
Under the neon lights
We shine so bright all night
No worries just the sound
Our hearts forever bound

[Verse 3]
Lost in beats every turn
Feel the heat watch it burn
Friends around the laughter flies
In your eyes the fire lies

[Bridge]
City hums electric grace
Nighttime in this vibrant place
Every voice a melody
Come alive you and me

[Verse 4]
Moments last never fade
Memory in every shade
Daybreak comes too soon it seems
We'll stay lost in our dreams
title: Under the Neon Lights
